name: Wil Qing Gew
title: Mobile Developer
description: Mobile App Developer who enjoys translating research into production results. Research-driven and focused on performance optimization, maintainable mobile architecture, and modern development practices.
Experienced in Xamarin.Forms development and MAUI migration research and implementation.

responsibility: Core contributor in a team-based cross platform mobile application developed from scratch using Xamarin.Forms.
Responsible for researching, planning, and implementing the migration from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI.
Conducted technical research and prototyping with the team to assess MAUI compatibility and migration risks.
Self-learned HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to complete assigned tasks with quality.
Performed optimization by leveraging online resources for continuous improvement.
